definition: to just happen to coincide with the occasion (idiom)/to be present just at the right time
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to meet by chance/to come across/(of a calendar event) to come along/(of an event) to fall on (a particular day)/to fawn upon
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Pittsburgh was a perfect venue for this work.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，以匹茲堡作爲會議地點適逢其會。
